docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: ''Jobless and Hopeless, Many Quit the Labor Force'' (front page, April 27) hit home for my husband and me.
docs.abstract: Sandy Schmidt letter on plight of people who lose both jobs and health insurance; calls for universal coverage
docs.snippet: To the Editor:    ''Jobless and Hopeless, Many Quit the Labor Force'' (front page, April 27) hit home for my husband and me.
